channel.title: Error Connecting to server! please help me
channel.description: i made a rsps and set the ip's in server.java and client.java to my no-ip IP address, i also portforwarded it. yet it says when i try to login "Error Connectiong to Server"

item.title: Error Connecting to server! please help me
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

[quote=“Chaotic-Madness, post:2, topic:428300”][quote author=Shadow742000 link=topic=530991.msg3878463#msg3878463 date=1325826096]
i made a rsps and set the ip’s in server.java and client.java to my no-ip IP address, i also portforwarded it. yet it says when i try to login “Error Connectiong to Server”
[/quote]

You have very low information.

1: Did you portforward right?
2: Did you enable the port on your firewall?
3: Dd you get no-ip duc?
4: did you check if you had putted in the right ip in the ipv4 when you type cmd?
5: did you compile?
6: Is some of the client file missing?

i believe i protforwarded right, i enabled the port, yup i got that its running still, i typed that ip into my client.java, and server.java yes, i did compile, and no

As you can see i asked alot of basic Questions there because you didn’t put enought information.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Error Connecting to server! please help me
